thread.title: 50 bday trip to Paris
thread.title_full: 50 bday trip to Paris - Review of Golden Tulip Opera De Noailles, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Peter R
title: 50 bday trip to Paris
text: Just got back from Paris. I booked the trip for my wife's 50th. We stayed at this hotel on the recommendation of a friend. She really got it right. The hotel is in a fantastic neighbourhood. Walking distance to the Louvre, the Opera and great shopping and restaurants. The hotel was clean, modern and the staff were excellent. Whether it was a simple "Bon jour" or whether it was a dinner reservation or even just directions to a specific sight. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay and will definitely be back.
